Text: At the #elmjp meetup in Tokyo I talked about replicating Swift UI MeshGradient in WebGL. Using Oscillator from @mech_elephant elm-animator package, I could animate positions and colors of control points! https://x.com/unsoundscapes/status/1859143082156892236/video/1
